C Hing, here is the deal.
The lease can end prematurely when both parties are notified and have notice, and the acceptance can be implied by conduct
"重叫我俾條匙佢等佢可以早d清潔" is the affirmation. Therefore, its alright, your lease ended on 15th.
Now, speaking of the 逼我聽日走 ? I did not get what you meant, but I assume you do not have any of your properties in the apartment, and what he said means "I will force you to leave tomorrow (which is 9th, 15th). He is repudiating your lease / breach of lease. Since you both have terminated the lease in the day "搬個日" and he pretends he has not
You have two options
1) You affirm the 逼我聽日走 and sue him.
2) You stand firm and 堅守15號先走
This is the first issue you have to deal with.
Speaking with 門有裂痕, since you have already put the lease to an end "搬個日", you are no longer responsible in the covenants in the lease (keep the property maintained), basically you have released yourself.
So heres my suggestion
1) You have put the end of the lease when you 早左搬走 and he affirmed it by gaining entry into the property.
2) 1) You affirm the 逼我聽日走 and sue him, in exchange for the door.
